code: import React,{createContext,useState,useEffect}from'react';import{getTips}from'../api/tipsApi';export const TipsContext=createContext();const TipsProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[tips,setTips]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchTips=async()=>{try{const response=await getTips();setTips(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching tips',error);}};fetchTips();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(TipsContext.Provider,{value:{tips}},children);};export default TipsProvider;
